title: DireWolfM14
author: DireWolfM14
created_time: May 28, 2022, 08:05:18 AMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 04:16:35 PM by DireWolfM14
content: All prices include shipping anywhere in the United States, for international or discrete shipping please contact MinerJones.All accessories and documentation are included unless otherwise noted.The M14 receiver heal is not for sale.Payments here: bc1q2nwf4njwkpeuyycx5a95nj6mf8m45djdk863xsOr, if you prefer we can use escrow.Ledger Nano X$100 - Ledger Nano S$40 - KeepKey.  New, unopened.$35 - KeepKey.  No cable or documentation included.$20 -

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 28, 2022, 08:05:18 AMAll prices include shipping anywhere in the United States, for international shipping please contact MinerJones.All accessories and documentation are included unless otherwise noted.How much are you asking for ledger nano x model?Note that I don't want to use it as a hardware wallet myself, but I am thinking of helping some people that need spare parts like casing and display, and new one is to expensive.That is if I don't manage to convince them to stop using ledger all together

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on May 31, 2022, 11:32:30 AMHow much are you asking for ledger nano x model?$125.  I updated the OP to include prices in USD $cam tokens.   Quote from: dkbit98 on May 31, 2022, 11:32:30 AMNote that I don't want to use it as a hardware wallet myself, but I am thinking of helping some people that need spare parts like casing and display, and new one is to expensive.Lol, if you buy it you can do whatever you want with it.  It's worth noting, however that the Nano X is like new.  I've never actually used it as my regular hardware wallet.  I only played with it to learn about how Ledgers work.  When I first got it I imported a hot wallet into to and made a couple of transactions.  Then I restored it and it's been sitting in the drawer for almost two years.  It is one of the early models without the problematic battery.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 31, 2022, 01:19:34 PM$125.  I updated the OP to include prices in USD $cam tokens.   Sorry but I will have to decline your offer, this is to much for me especially when the box was opened, even if you didn't use it at all (and you did).I just checked ledger website and brand new nono X device costs around 149€ with free shipping, and I can find it even locally. Maybe I am going to try Ebay auctions, people are selling them for around $60 - $70 or even cheaper.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.created_time: June 01, 2022, 04:15:27 PMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 06:43:42 PM by DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on June 01, 2022, 03:23:47 PMSorry but I will have to decline your offer, this is to much for me especially when the box was opened, even if you didn't use it at all (and you did).No worries, thanks for your interest, nonetheless.Quote from: dkbit98 on June 01, 2022, 03:23:47 PMI just checked ledger website and brand new nono X device costs around 149€ with free shipping, and I can find it even locally. Woah, I checked their site this past weekend and I could have swore they were asking $179 (USD,) but now I see they're asking $149 (USD, not Euros.)  I agree, $125 is too much, I'll drop it to $100.I'm not in a hurry to sell any of these, I just got tired of these things taking up room in my drawer.  Give the ad a few more days, and if I don't get any bites I may be willing to entertain offers.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on June 01, 2022, 04:15:27 PMI'm not in a hurry to sell any of these, I just got tired of these things taking up room in my drawer.  Give the ad a few more days, and if I don't get any bites I may be willing to entertain offers.Yeah I think they lowered the price after they released Nono S plus, and they realized how much issues model X has with battery and firmware.I think that Craigslist has the option to sell stuff for cryptocurrencies so you could try offering it there as well, that is if you have account there.Ebay auction is also an option but only for USD or unwithdrawable fake bitcoin, so it would be interesting if you could give it a try in Bitcointalk auctions
